Interface ITopNOptions

Preferred object for providing options to TopN queries.

interface ITopNOptions {
    end?: number;
    exporterNodeCriteria?: string;
    ifIndex?: number;
    includeOther?: boolean;
    N: number;
    start?: number;
    step?: number;
}
